pr_title: CXF-8324: Allow wider range of values for attachment properties

timeline.message:
CXF-8324: Allow wider range of values for attachment properties

Provide better error if the given value is not allowed
Document allowed values for properties

timeline.bodyText: Maybe for /dev/null we could instead just use something like Files.createTempDirectory instead - I'm not sure if the former would work properly on windows?
timeline.author: coheigea

replies.bodyText: As long as nobody want's to access the file this works on Windows. A File instance does not validate the path when creating it.
replies.author: theobisproject
